supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_01]: "Logging my time at the end of the day takes way too long. I have to click through so many screens just to add time for one project task. It's easily 10-15 minutes wasted."
[FDBK_09]: "Because it's such a hassle, I often put it off until Friday afternoon and then struggle to remember exactly what I worked on early in the week."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a faster, more streamlined process for entering their time.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_02]: "The overall look is very dated. It feels clunky, and sometimes I'm not sure which button I'm supposed to press to submit my timesheet."
[FDBK_07]: "Making corrections is a nightmare. If I accidentally submit my timesheet before it's complete, getting it back, editing it, and resubmitting involves way too many steps and approvals."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a more modern, intuitive, and user-friendly interface.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_03]: "I travel a lot for client meetings. It's impossible to log time easily when I'm not at my desk. I wish I could just quickly add entries from my phone right after a meeting."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need mobile access to the time tracking portal for convenient time entry on the go.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_04]: "The system becomes incredibly slow, almost unusable, late in the afternoon, especially on Thursdays and Fridays. Trying to submit my timesheet before leaving is frustrating."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a system that is responsive and performs well, even during peak usage times.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_05]: "Why can't I easily see a summary of my hours for the week broken down by project? I need this for my own records, but the portal doesn't offer a simple view like that. Generating reports seems impossible for regular users."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need easy access to summaries and reports of their time entries.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_08]: "The dropdown list for project codes is massive and in a random order. Finding the right code takes ages, and I've picked the wrong one by mistake more than once because I was rushing."
[FDBK_10]: "Sometimes the project codes I need aren't even in the system yet, especially for new projects. I have to chase finance to get them added."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need an easier way to find and select the correct project codes, and a more efficient process for adding new project codes.

task_2_survey_design.survey_goal: To gather detailed information about user satisfaction with the current NovaTime portal, identify specific pain points, and prioritize potential improvements to enhance user experience and data accuracy.

survey_questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall ease of use of the NovaTime portal?
survey_questions.purpose: To gauge overall user satisfaction with the portal's usability.

survey_questions.question_text: How frequently do you experience performance issues (e.g., slowness, errors) while using the NovaTime portal?
survey_questions.purpose: To quantify the frequency of performance issues experienced by users.

survey_questions.question_text: Which of the following features would most improve your experience with the NovaTime portal? (Select all that apply)
options: Improved search functionality for project codes
survey_questions.purpose: To identify the most desired features for improving the portal.

survey_questions.question_text: How much time, on average, does it take you to complete your time entry for a typical day?
survey_questions.purpose: To quantify the time burden associated with time entry.

survey_questions.question_text: How important is it to you to have mobile access to the NovaTime portal?
survey_questions.purpose: To assess the importance of mobile accessibility to users.

survey_questions.question_text: What are the biggest frustrations you experience when using the NovaTime portal?
survey_questions.purpose: To gather open-ended feedback about user frustrations and pain points.

supporting_evidence: Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_04]: "The system becomes incredibly slow, almost unusable, late in the afternoon, especially on Thursdays and Fridays."
Reference to scenario_description.txt: Inefficient system impacts accuracy and reliability of time tracking data.
